snippet: The workers fell from a height of about two stories, the Fire Department said; three workers were expected to be released from the hospital, while a fourth was admitted in stable condition.
abstract: Four construction workers are injured and admitted to Bellevue Hospital Center after falling two stories while doing interior demolition work on building in midtown Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The workers fell from a height of about two stories, the Fire Department said; three workers were expected to be released from the hospital, while a fourth was admitted in stable condition.

headline.main: 4 Workers Injured at Midtown Manhattan Construction Site
headline.print_headline: Four Injured in Midtown While Doing Demolition
